title: TEMP DATA - Game Engine
description: TEMP DATA - A lightweight 3D engine built with WebGL.
content: TEMP DATA - This is a 3D game engine I built from scratch using WebGL and Three.js. It features a custom rendering loop, basic physics, and asset loading.

title: TEMP DATA - Art Portfolio Generator
description: TEMP DATA - A tool to auto-generate art portfolios using GPT and image uploads.
content: TEMP DATA - This tool lets users upload artwork and generate descriptions and layout suggestions using GPT-4. Built with Next.js and Tailwind.
